metadata.title: CVE-2019-3902 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in Mercurial before 4.9. It was possible to use symlinksand subrepositories to defeat Mercurial's path-checking logic and writefiles outside a repository.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3902` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mercurial - 4.8.2-1ubuntu4
mercurial-common - 4.8.2-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mercurial package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.8.2-1ubuntu4').
